page.title: 05A Preston Brook Farmer
page.content:
Miss Ruth Whitlow is a farmer in partnership with her mother in the family farm. Here she keeps the house and - with the sheep and lambs - also looks after the veterinary side of the business.
Her many talents, developed by herself, include painting in oils and watercolours, and working in china and porcelain. She also makes tapestries and embroidery, including needle-painted pictures and rug-making. Miss Whitlow also does flower arrangements, presses flowers (and decorates with them), makes collages and corn dollies, as well as making cakes and gateaux.
A true lover of the countryside her other interests include bird watching, gardening and reading country books.
